name: Mystery of the Ziggurat
description:
You've been trapped while exploring some ancient ruins, but it seems like you're not alone!

Can you discover the mystery of the ziggurat, and the secrets of its builders?

Procedurally generated levels for infinite replayability, speedrun timer + seed selection menu to compete against your friends!

Entry for Godot Wild Jam #42

Theme: Ancient, Modifiers: Heavy lies the crown, Gotta go fast, Mom I'm on TV

Assets used:

Mixamo animations

Makehuman
